properties.name: data-reader
properties.description: Key in JSON Datasource for records.

properties.name: http-method
properties.description: Type of HTTP call, POST,GET etc.

properties.name: display-field
properties.description: Name of key inside response data to display on ui.

properties.name: value-field
properties.description: Name of key inside response data.use to send to backend.

columnProperties.name: width
columnProperties.description: Custom width for each column.Width must be in % but no need to mention %.

events.name: rowSelect
events.description: It will gives you row clicked data.

events.name: onHeaderClick
events.description: It will gives you click event and column info.

events.name: selectedRowData
events.description: It will fire only on selection of checkbox and gives you selected record data.
